content: solitude solitude was born basically out of boredom i was scared about a certain vi- rus we have heard way too much about and i was self-isolating out of fear my boredom is your gain i used one skein of mandala wool blend in poseidon i used almost all of the skein i used an i hook for this but you can use any size hook you like stuff you need to know puff st *yo insert hook into st or space and pull up a loop* 4 times yo pull through 7 loops yo pull through rem 2 loops puff st cluster *yo insert hook into space yo pull up a loop* 3 times yo pull through 6 loops yo pull through rem 2 loops chain 2 repeat from to 2 more times puff st cluster made center vst double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet center vst increase 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet vst double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet fan st 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet other stuff you need to know rem remaining stitches repeat repeat st/sts stitch or stitches space space let s get on with it shall we progress/tutorial photos start on page 4 row 1 in a magic_ring chain 4 double_crochet in ring chain 1 center vst chain 1 double_crochet in ring chain 1 double_crochet in ring 6 double_crochet row 2 3 double_crochet increase chain 3 2 double_crochet in same space as chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet and in each chain 1 space to vst center vst increase double_crochet in each double_crochet and in each chain 1 space 3 double_crochet in last double_crochet 18 double_crochet row 3 3 double_crochet increase chain 1 skip next double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 times chain 1 center vst double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip next double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 times chain 1 skip next double_crochet 3 double_crochet in last double_crochet row 4 3 double_crochet increase double_crochet in each double_crochet and in each chain 1 space until vst center vst increase double_crochet in each double_crochet and in each chain 1 space 3 double_crochet in last double_crochet 32 double_crochet row 5 3 double_crochet increase chain 5 skip next 4 double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet until you reach center vst chain 5 skip next 5 double_crochet center vst chain 5 skip next 4 double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet repeat to the last 6 double_crochet chain 5 skip next 5 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in last double_crochet row 6 3 double_crochet increase double_crochet in next double_crochet work decrease over next double_crochet and next chain 5 space 5 double_crochet in same chain 5 space work decrease over same chain 5 space and next chain 5 space across to center vst on last repeat before vst work decrease over last chain 5 space and next double_crochet center vst increase work decrease over next double_crochet and next chain 5 space 5 double_crochet in same chain 5 space work decrease over last chain 5 space and next chain 5 space repeat across on last repeat work
